text: ebævin kavurun (ættenma) visvasaya taba dæhæmi kriyavan karannoda, ovunge phalavipakayan ohu, ovunta purana vasayen laba di, tama dayaven nævata (nævatat) ovunta vædi karanu æta. kavurun garvitava (allahta vahalun vasayen sitima) adupaduvak vasayen dakinnoda, ovunva vedana gena dena danduvama magin ohu danduvam karanneya. allahma misa, tamanta mituranda, udav karannanda (ehidi) ovun nodakinnaha
